title: Textile, ca. 1900
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: Jacquard woven. With one warp (green) and one weft (green), a variety of bindings used for pattern.  The leaves are 7&1 satin and the background is warp-faced plain  weave. Loomed width: 25 1/2 inches.
